contest-event.event-date:
May 31, 1986 D Clydebank Centenary Open Contest
Clydebank Centenary Open Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
clydebank-centenary-open-contest
None
Clydebank, Dunbartonshire Best soloist - R.Gray (Clydebank), best trombones Shotts, best basses Broxburn, best percussion Bon Accord, deportment Kilmarnock Concert. Best section 2 band - Tullis Russell. Best section 3 band - Dunaskin Doon. Best section 4 band - Coalburn Silver. See also Strathclyde Charities Contest of which this is part.
16 bands competed.
Nov. 16, 2012, 10:32 a.m. Oct. 19, 2014, 6:39 a.m.
1 Shotts St Patrick's Brass David Loukes
2 Kilmarnock Concert Brass Andrew Keachie
